com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.interfaces.shared_services

Interface IServiceContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAccessContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockServiceContext, ModuleUtils.ServiceContext

    public interface IServiceContext
    Helper class to give access to all the configured services available in the application. This should be used as a passthrough to ModuleUtils.getService(Class, Optional)
    Author:
    Burch

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<IColumnarService> getColumnarService()
      (safe for use when called from a context) Returns an instance of the currently configured columnar service.
      Optional<com.google.inject.Provider<IColumnarService>> getColumnarServiceProvider()
      THIS VERSION IS PREFERRED IN GUICE-MANAGED CODE SINCE IT HANDLES CIRCULAR DEPENDENCIES (in contexts the non-provider version is fine though) Returns an instance of the currently configured columnar service.
      IManagementDbService getCoreManagementDbService()
      (safe for use when called from a context) Returns an instance of the currently configured _core_ mangement db service (which sits above the actual technology configured for the management db service via service.ManagementDbService.*).
      com.google.inject.Provider<IManagementDbService> getCoreManagementDbServiceProvider()
      THIS VERSION IS PREFERRED IN GUICE-MANAGED CODE SINCE IT HANDLES CIRCULAR DEPENDENCIES (in contexts the non-provider version is fine though) Returns an instance of the currently configured _core_ mangement db service (which sits above the actual technology configured for the management db service via service.ManagementDbService.*).

      (safe for use when called from a context) Returns an instance of the currently configured document service.

      GlobalPropertiesBean getGlobalProperties()
      Returns an instance of the global configuration parameters This is a helper function that just calls getDataService(Class)

      (safe for use when called from a context) Returns an instance of the currently configured graph service.

    • Method Detail

      • getService

        <I extends IUnderlyingService> Optional<I> getService(Class<I> serviceClazz,
                                                      Optional<String> serviceName)
        (safe for use when called from a context) Enables access to the data services available in the system. The currently configured instance of the class passed in will be returned if it exists, null otherwise.
        Parameters:
        serviceClazz - The class of the resource you want to access e.g. ISecurityService.class
        Returns:
        the data service requested or null if it does not exist

      • getServiceProvider

        <I extends IUnderlyingService> Optional<com.google.inject.Provider<I>> getServiceProvider(Class<I> serviceClazz,
                                                                                          Optional<String> serviceName)
        THIS VERSION IS PREFERRED IN GUICE-MANAGED CODE SINCE IT HANDLES CIRCULAR DEPENDENCIES (in contexts the non-provider version is fine though) Enables access to the data services available in the system. The currently configured instance of the class passed in will be returned if it exists, null otherwise.
        Parameters:
        serviceClazz - The class of the resource you want to access e.g. ISecurityService.class
        Returns:
        the data service requested or null if it does not exist
